description: King Philippe expresses his "deepest regrets" to DR Congo's president for Belgium's colonial rule.
title: Belgian king expresses 'deepest regrets' for DR Congo colonial abuses
title_page: Belgian king expresses 'deepest regrets' for DR Congo colonial abuses - BBC News
maintext: But he says there have been "painful episodes" in their history, including during the reign of King Leopold II - who he does not directly name - and in the 20th Century.
